participant_1.background:
I hope to retire someday soon.
I keep things to myself instead of speaking my mind.
I love to ride horses.
I love having facial hair.
My left leg hurts me daily.

participant_2.background:
I am an eccentric hair stylist for dogs.
I fake a british accent to seem more attractive.
My favorite past time is collecting civil war antiques.
I have an allergy to mangoes.

content.text: Hey! What do you do for a living?
I'm a hair stylist for dogs! I love it.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn to braid my dog's hair.
It's not too hard! I can teach you sometime.
That would be great!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to ride horses. I have a horse named Charlie.
That's awesome! I love horses too. I used to ride when I was younger.
Oh, really? What kind of horses did you ride?
I used to ride a lot of different breeds, but my favorite was a Quarter Horse named Midnight.
Midnight sounds like a great horse.
He was the best! I miss riding him.
I'm sure you do. I'm glad you got to experience that.
Me too. So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to collect civil war antiques. I have a collection of swords, uniforms, and other items.
That's really interesting! I've never been into antiques, but I can appreciate the history behind them.
I love learning about the civil war. It was such a fascinating time in American history.
It was. I'm glad you're so passionate about it.
Thanks! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
